tagline: Waste to Wonder

description:
Rebello Creations is a sustainable lifestyle brand that transforms discarded glass bottles from brands like Absolut Vodka, Bombay Sapphire, Old Monk, and others into handcrafted luxury decor and utility products. Each product is handmade using upcycling techniques that reduce landfill waste, save energy, and promote conscious living.

- Upcycled drinking glasses
- Bottle lamps
- Candle holders
- Soap dispensers
- Planters
- Home decor made from reused glass

- Equivalent of 60 trees saved
- Reduced carbon emissions by avoiding new glass production
- Supports circular economy
